stem: Перед установкой a new bonded шлифования wheel, which check is recommended?

choices.text: Spin it up on the шлифмашины at full speed
Perform a звуковая проверка («ринг‑тест») and inspect for cracks
Soak the wheel in oil for cooling
Tap the wheel with a metal hammer as hard as possible

rationales.B: A ring (sound) test and visual inspection help detect hidden cracks before use.
